name: ParkMe
description:
What is this?

This is my first game in unity. It is a simple 2D against the clock prototype game.

Enjoy playing it!

Who do I talk to?

For more info about how am I and what I do, you can check my website: https://horiacondrea.com/

Can I see the code?

Sure! You can check out the source code: https://github.com/horiacondrea/ParkMe

Feedback?

More than welcome. Please feel free to comment and share your ideas with me.
